siteMetadata.title: One Answer for Your Problem
siteMetadata.subtitle: Bring the best answer to lost programmer

markdownRemark.html:
Question: Rsync creates one more directory “tests” inside of existing “tests”

Answer: If you don’t want another tests directory created, the correct command would be

rsync -avzp —del -e “ssh -p myport” user@hostname:/var/www/tests/ /var/www/tests Note the / at the end of user@hostname:/var/www/tests/.

Works on 2019-01-22T19:11:49 +0800

Original Link
